title: WATCH: Ntando Duma and Sbahle’s cute runway debut
text:
WATCH: Ntando Duma and Sbahle’s cute runway debut share this

Ntando Duma’s daughter Sbahle had her first runway adventure at AFI SA Fashion Week this past weekend.

Ntando often brightens our day when she shares cute moments of herself and her baby girl on social media, and this time was no exception – if a bit more stylish than usual.

“This was incredibly magical!!! What a moment with my best friend @sbahlemziziThank you @khosinkosi for this platform,” she wrote.

The 24-year-old TV personality and her daughter modelled Khosi Nkosi’s stunning designs at the event.

Read more: Ntando Duma’s daughter celebrates first birthday in pink birthday bash

The mother-daughter moment was so adorable, it captured our hearts.

Watch the cute video clip below:
description: The 24-year-old TV personality and her daughter modelled Khosi Nkosi’s stunning designs at the event.
